interpretation:
The "world map" emoji represents a sense of exploration and adventure. It suggests a desire to explore new places and experience new things. This card can indicate a time of travel or a need to broaden your horizons. It may also suggest a sense of global perspective, encouraging you to consider the interconnectedness of all things. 

In a reading, the "world map" card can indicate a need to step outside of your comfort zone and explore new opportunities. It may also suggest a time of expansion and growth, both personally and professionally. This card can be a reminder to keep an open mind and embrace new experiences.
